Useful Web Service

Shop July Twenty Two: funky fresh things for modern day hippies

The Problem

The artist wanted a DIY interface to post product information and to process transactions. She prefers to focus on making product and expects the online portion of her business to "just work" and not cost a lot to maintain.

The Solution

Weebly, square, and a lot of Instagram.

Results

The artist has enough business to keep inventory close to zero. Almost too busy making stuff.
